title: where can i get my phone fixed, i've the warranty and live in hyderabad but there's no service here
content: The display of my device is gone from april, because of the lockdown I wasn't able to get it fixed. I stay in Hyderabad and i have a lot of important things in that phone and I need it fixed ASAP. Its been more than 45 days i reached out to the google service centre. Please help me out.
